## Matrix4x4.transformAffine() method

Transform a vector by this matrix, assuming this matrix presents an affine transformation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
transformAffine(vec: Vector4, result?: Vector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vec | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | The vector to be transformed. |
|  result | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector (can be the same as vec), if not specified, a new vector will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md)

The output vector
